long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight any text on a web page, right-click, and select "Polyglot Reader - Read Text". You can select the source language and target language in the extension settings.

This app is super helpful if you are learning a new language and want to improve listening comprehension. It's great for both text-to-speech and also translations.
